caption.center: Robert Bouser, Appellant, v. State of Missouri, Respondent.

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court of Jackson County, C. William Kramer, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
John M. Schilmoeller, Appellate Public Defender, Kansas City, for Appellant.
Jeremiah W. (Jay) Nixon, Attorney General, John Munson Morris and Breck K. Burgess, Assistant Attorney General, Jefferson City, for Respondent.
opinion.panel: Before Robert G. Ulrich, Presiding Judge, Paul M. Spinden, Judge, and Edwin H. Smith, Judge.
opinion.opinion_text: ORDER Robert Bouser appeals the circuit court's judgment denying his motion for postconviction relief under Rule 29.15 without an evidentiary hearing. We affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
